{"games":[{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1362577,"totalDownVotes":61233,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"[💎x3] Pet Simulator X!","placeId":6284583030,"playerCount":248725,"imageToken":"T_6284583030_936f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEXT CODE AT 1.4MM LIKES! ❤️💙
Use code "1mplus300k" for x2 Ultra Lucky Boosts! (Thanks for 1.3MM 💖!)

Pet Simulator X is the latest and greatest game in the Pet Simulator Series with tons of new features and pets!

💰 Collect coins to buy eggs!
🥚 Hatch legendary pets like a Dragon or Unicorn!
🗺️ Unlock and explore new areas & worlds like floating islands!
🔄 Collect and trade pets with other players to become the best!
✨ Upgrade pets or fuse them together!

🎁 Latest Update [11/13/21] -
- 👽 Alien Pets!
- 🧪 Alien Lab!
- 🛸 Alien Forest!
- 🥚 3 New Eggs!
- ✨ 2 New Mythicals!
- 🔥 Huge Pegasus Pets!
- 💰 Giant Alien Chest!
- 💎 Diamond Cap Raised!
- 📝 Interface Upgrades!
- ⚙️ Auto Delete Additions!
- ⚖️ Balancing!
- 🎃 Halloween Event Over!
+ MORE!

💡 Join the BIG Games groups for a FREE pet!

🧡 Made with love by Preston


🔔 Follow for game updates! 🔔","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1206988,"totalDownVotes":81240,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[💀UPDATE 16] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":165788,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💀 UPDATE 16 /  UPDATE OUT NOW
2 new Fruits, new island, new weapon, new secrets!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2100
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Venom, Control, Dragon, and REVIVE + SHADOW!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":636570,"totalDownVotes":42643,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[🍀 SALE] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":80144,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!

👊 Collect and train the strongest fighters!
🌲 Discover new worlds, with new fighters in each one!
✨ The possibilities are endless!

-New Island: Land of Alchemy!
-16 New Fighters
-Enemies can spawn with passives!

-Level cap increased to 210!

Also follow these contributors!

Make sure to hit the FOLLOW button to be notified of new updates!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":680453,"totalDownVotes":146005,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🪂 [2x XP + AIRDROPS!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":94498,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"NEW KIT: 🏹 Vanessa!

🔊 Voice Chat Queue
Only players with voice chat enabled are able to join. Have fun while this lasts!

[Shift]: Sprint
[E]: Open Inventory
[Q]: Drop item
[Ctrl]: Lock camera
[T]: Use Spray

How to play BedWars:
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a game
🛌 Protect your base. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn!
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the game!

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":839082,"totalDownVotes":63834,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[🌟⛅] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":61516,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Thanks for playing!

","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":375764,"totalDownVotes":20282,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🎃UPDATE 4.5] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":23021,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint","genre":""},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":5096715,"totalDownVotes":986208,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":97947,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎤 Sing 2 x Adopt Me! 🎤

Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

🐾 New updates coming soon!

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2417770,"totalDownVotes":318058,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":49336,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❄️11:18: Pre-Winter Update out now in new servers! Read the update log for more info♡

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4668563,"totalDownVotes":394928,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":47038,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3728689,"totalDownVotes":372529,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":53486,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.10.1
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":6556072,"creatorName":"Universe Time Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":479630,"totalDownVotes":80802,"universeId":1782832995,"name":"[🗿 UPDATE 🎭] A Universal Time","placeId":5130598377,"playerCount":18153,"imageToken":"T_5130598377_12c","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❗ Welcome to A Universal Time ❗

🔊Sounds are sourced from a majority of open libraries and our sound designers. These can be removed upon legitimate request.🔊","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3501259,"totalDownVotes":444562,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":22740,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!
","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":700041,"totalDownVotes":76773,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":19504,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.896』 🏹✨

➢ Exploits patched

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Cr Clothing: Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":509732,"totalDownVotes":248072,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":28570,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1385692,"totalDownVotes":78195,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":23374,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1811452,"totalDownVotes":144002,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":21841,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

--- 25% more gold!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1998376,"totalDownVotes":157627,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces: Pacific Cold Front Pt.1","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8525,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

👍 550k likes to unlock the Stars & Love Outfit!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":786449,"totalDownVotes":53686,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":14695,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. Team up with friends to fend off countless waves of zombies, fight bosses, earn coins, level up, and buy new towers! If you're feeling up for a challenge, try taking on harder bosses on harder difficulties!

👥💵 Join the group for +$100 starting cash! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍Thumbs up and favorite for more quality updates!🌟

🔨UPDATES🔨
